summary: mtd: rawnand: gpmi: don't leak PM reference in error path
details:
mtd: rawnand: gpmi: don't leak PM reference in error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.181 by commit 4cd3281a910a5adf73b2a0a82241dd67844d0b25, it was introduced in version v5.4.174 by commit 29218853877a748a2ca41d9957a84b2d6a7f56a7. For more details please see the references link.
